title: Allow maps to override the player viewport size.

body:
There has been ongoing interest from the multiplayer community in being able to force a specific viewport size on all players during tournaments etc. The plumbing to support this has existed for a while now (starting with the arbitrary zoom support, extended by remaster viewport scaling support) so I don't see why we can't expose this as an optional feature for custom maps / minigames.

The feature is demonstrated on Fort Lonestar as a testcase.
